Producer: Steve Richards, Renee Tab, Christopher Tuffin, Christopher Milburn
Production Co: Signature Films, Endurance Media, Wideangle Films, The Searchers NV, BurningBull SPFX, Yorkshire Film Services II, AGC Studios, Sentient Entertainment, Sentient Pictures
Synopsis: Ex-special forces operative Mason Pettis (John Cena) is stuck in a dead-end desk job when he reluctantly takes on a freelance gig to provide private security for washed-up journalist Claire Wellington (Alison Brie) as she interviews the ruthless--but impeccably dressed--dictator, Juan Venegas (Juan Pablo Raba). When a military coup breaks out just as she's about to get the scoop of a lifetime, the unlikely trio must figure out how to survive the jungle AND each other in order to make it out alive!
Title: Freelance
